text: Tanya () is a 1940 Soviet comedy movie directed by Grigori Aleksandrov.Средства художественной отразительностиСветлый путь (1940) It stars Lyubov Orlova, Yevgeny Samoylov, and Elena Tyapkina. ==Actors== *Lyubov Orlova - Tatyana Morozova *Yevgeny Samoylov - Alexey Lebedev *Elena Tyapkina - Maria Sergeevna Pronina *Vladimir Volodin - professor Pyotr Taldykin *Osip Abdulov - Feodor Karpovich Dorokhov *Nikolay Konovalov - Nikolai Zubkov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1940 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Grigori Aleksandrov
title: Tanya (1940 movie)
